settings.text: Inspired by tradition and designed for wellness. Solid wood, heated stones, steam ‚Äì enjoy an authentic, classic sauna experience.

Outexer 2 person¬†sauna

Outexer's two-person infrared sauna offers a variety of indoor and outdoor models to meet your different usage scenarios. We always insist on using natural and environmentally friendly raw materials, such as Canadian hemlock, okoume and cedar, with advanced far-infrared carbon fiber heating technology and intelligent control system, to bring you a comfortable, safe and efficient home sauna experience.

The exterior design style is modern and simple, which not only enhances the style of the home space, but also extends your life taste. The sauna has a solid structure and excellent thermal insulation performance. It uses high-quality tempered glass doors and windows, with a wide field of vision. Even if two people sit in it, there is no sense of oppression, bringing visual and functional dual enjoyment.

Why choose Outexer?

Comfort and technology:¬†Each wooden panel has been finely polished, feels smooth and burr-free, bringing a skin-friendly and non-irritating experience. Equipped with a new generation of graphene heating panels and intelligent temperature control system, it is safe and secure.

Durable:¬†We have taken into account the high-frequency use needs of the family from the design stage. The overall structure is stable and durable, and can maintain comfort and stability for a long time.

Multiple sizes available:¬†Available in multiple sizes to suit your bedroom, gym, basement or yard space, there is always one that suits you.

Easy to clean and maintain:¬†The wooden boards can be wiped with a damp towel; all electrical systems are rigorously tested at the factory for durability and peace of mind.


Health benefits of sauna

  • Relieve muscle and joint pain and relax the whole body
  • Promote blood circulation, speed up recovery and metabolism
  • Help relieve stress and improve sleep quality
  • Support sweating and detoxification, improve skin health
  • Assist fat loss and help maintain a good body shape


Frequently Asked Questions (2 Person Sauna FAQs)


1. What is a far infrared sauna? Is it safe?
Far infrared saunas heat the human body directly with infrared rays instead of air, which increases the body's core temperature, thereby promoting blood circulation and sweating. Compared with traditional steam saunas, the temperature is lower and the experience is gentler, making it more suitable for daily use. The infrared heating panels we use are all designed with low electromagnetic radiation (Low EMF) and have passed multiple safety certifications, making them safe and worry-free for daily use.


2. How do you assemble your sauna? Is it convenient?
Our saunas are modular and can be easily assembled according to the instructions after receiving the goods. The wooden boards are mostly pre-installed with metal clips, which do not require complicated tools and can be completed by just tightening a few screws. Each model also comes with a video installation guide, which makes it easy to get started.


3. Does a 2-person sauna require a special circuit?
Yes, some models (especially those with a power of around 2000W) recommend the use of a 20A socket (NEMA 5-20R) to ensure safe and stable operation of the circuit. Please check the "Electrical Parameters" column on the product details page before purchasing, or consult our customer service.


4. What are the dimensions of a 2-person sauna?
The design concept of the Outexer double sauna is to provide sufficient internal space while saving as much floor space as possible. The dimensions of different models vary slightly. Please refer to the detailed specification table at the bottom of each product page for details. There is always one that suits your home space.

settings.heading: The Timeless Sauna Ritual
settings.text: A sauna is more than just a heat experience, it's a ritual that purifies the body and mind, soothes the emotions, and cultivates self-care. Outexer traditional saunas uphold this timeless essence, crafted from natural wood, heated stones, and a steam bath inspired by Nordic culture. Whether you're enjoying a moment alone or with family, they offer relaxation and rejuvenation.

settings.heading: Pure Nature, Personalized Choice
settings.text: Each Outexer sauna embodies the beauty of pure simplicity, crafted from carefully handcrafted wood and heated stone heaters. Choose between dry heat or steam to create a personalized atmosphere. Customizable to your preferences, with either a fixed installation or easy assembly, the saunas seamlessly integrate into your home, lifestyle, and daily rhythms.

settings.heading: Traditional Wisdom, Modern Wellness
settings.text: Outexer traditional saunas are inspired by Finnish traditions and designed for modern homes, striking a balance between classic and innovative. From compact indoor models to spacious outdoor options, our saunas offer a tranquil haven for restoring body and mind, relieving modern stresses, and designed to rejuvenate and last.

settings.heading: Why Choose Outexer?
settings.text:
Every Outexer sauna is a promise of quality:

Top-quality materials: We insist on using hand-selected Canadian hemlock, okoume or cedar to lay a solid and durable foundation.

Safe heating: Equipped with low electromagnetic field carbon fiber heating panels, infrared heat evenly penetrates the whole body, warms the core, and is safe and worry-free.

Exquisite details: Both indoor and outdoor models are equipped with reinforced tempered glass doors, carefully optimized ventilation systems and minimalist intelligent controls.

Just to ensure that every sauna experience is safer, more comfortable and smarter.

settings.custom_liquid:
Outexer Traditional Sauna FAQs

How long will it take to receive my sauna?
We process orders in 1‚Äì3 business days, and shipping usually takes 5‚Äì12 business days. So you‚Äôll have your sauna delivered in about 6‚Äì15 business days from your order.
How to assemble the sauna? Is it convenient?
Our saunas are modular and can be easily assembled according to the instructions after receiving the goods. The wooden boards are mostly pre-installed with metal clips, which do not require complicated tools and can be completed by just tightening a few screws. Each model also comes with a video installation guide, which makes it easy to get started.
Do I need a special circuit for a traditional sauna?
Yes. Traditional saunas, especially those with higher power ratings like 3kW or more running on 220~240V, require a dedicated electrical circuit to operate safely. This usually means installing a dedicated 20A or 30A circuit breaker and proper wiring. Standard household outlets are not suitable.
If your home doesn‚Äôt already have such a circuit, you‚Äôll need to hire a licensed electrician to install one according to local electrical codes. This ensures safe, reliable operation and protects your home‚Äôs electrical system.
What if my package arrives damaged?
üìå Cause: The package may have been crushed or bumped during shipping.

üí° Action: Please take clear photos of the entire box, shipping label, and SKU label. Then, record a complete unboxing video (if necessary). If you discover any damaged parts inside the box, we will immediately ship the damaged parts free of charge or arrange compensation.
How do I place an order and use a discount code?
Placing an order at Outexer.com is easy and secure:

1. Select the sauna model you like and click "Add to Cart".
2. Go to the shopping cart and check out.
3. Fill in your shipping and contact information.
4. On the checkout page, you'll see a field where you can enter a discount code if you have one.
5. If you don't have a discount code, don't worry - any available promotions or automatic discounts will be applied at checkout, and you'll see the final price before paying.

Simply follow the checkout steps to see a full breakdown before confirming your purchase.
Can I return the sauna if I‚Äôm not satisfied?
Yes. You can return the sauna to the location provided by our after-sales customer service team. Refunds will be issued as long as the sauna is returned within 30 days of purchase, unused, and in its original packaging.

settings.heading: 6. Do I need a 20A circuit for this sauna? What if my home doesn't have one?
settings.row_content:
Yes, for optimal performance and safety, models like the T-59C3 require a dedicated 20-amp circuit due to their higher power draw (e.g., 1800W). If your home doesn‚Äôt already have a 20A circuit, here‚Äôs how to get one installed:

How to Install a 20A Circuit at Home:

  1. Hire a Licensed Electrician
    Start by contacting a licensed electrician in your area. They‚Äôll assess your home‚Äôs electrical panel and confirm feasibility.
  2. Apply for a Permit (Usually Handled by the Electrician)
    Most states require a local electrical permit for new circuit installations. Your electrician can typically file the paperwork with your city or county building department.
  3. Install the New Circuit
    The electrician will install a 20A breaker in your main panel and run a new line to your sauna location. This will usually include a 20A outlet (like a NEMA 5-20 or 6-20 plug).
  4. Pass the Inspection
    After installation, a city inspector may visit to ensure everything complies with the National Electrical Code (NEC). Once approved, you‚Äôre good to go.

Typical Cost Range:

Expect to pay¬†$300‚Äì$600¬†depending on your location and complexity. This includes labor, materials, and permit fees.

‚ÄãNote:¬†For models under 1500W (like the T-50C), a standard 15A outlet may be sufficient. Always check the product‚Äôs power specs before use.

Need help finding an electrician or confirming compatibility? Feel free to contact our support team anytime.
